definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Hag 1:6 bundle, parcel, pouch, bag (prop. a binding, i.e. sthg. bound up);—´[[ח]] abs. Am 9:9 +, cstr. Ge 42:35 +; pl. cstr. [[חְרׂרוֹת]] v:Ge 42:35; —bundle or pouch (purse) of money Ge 42:35, Ge 42:35 (E), Pr 7:20; [[הַמּׂר]] ´[[ח]] Ct So 1:13 (fig. of lover); ´[[חְרוּרָה בִּח]] [[הַחַיִּים]] 1Sa 25:29 (fig.; v. I. [[חרר]]); [[פִּשְׁעִי]] ´[[חָתֻם בִּח]] Job 14:17 (i.e. hidden, forgotten Hi Bu al.; > al. treasured up), [[נׇקוּב]] ´[[ח]] Hag 1:6 (v. I. [[נקב]]).
